DS seems to be contemplating between the universities IU and UGA. He notes that while DA program at Kelley (discussed in the context of IU) have promising aspects, there seem to be more available opportunities at Honors UGA. Additionally though scholarships have been provided from IU and UGA, the latter offers slightly less in expenses, which could be perceived negatively or positively -- negatively if DS values monetary return more in his decision and positively if DS sees UGA as somewhat less of a financial burden despite what seems to be a preferable course option. In the context of expanded opportunities and potential for exploring various fields beyond his business degree, DS seems drawn more towards what UGA offers. Therefor, DS shows preference to UGA
